**Preguntas de Stack Overflow**
Cargar cada set de datos
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)

questions <- read_csv('questions.csv')
answers <- read_csv('answers.csv')
tags <- read_csv('tags.csv')
question_tags <- read_csv('question_tags.csv')
```

1. Left Join
```{r}
questions
question_tags
tags

questions %>%
  left_join(question_tags, by = c("id"="question_id"))

relacion <- questions %>%
  left_join(question_tags, by = c("id"="question_id"))

relacion 

relacion %>%
  left_join(tags, by = c("tag_id"="id"))

questions_with_tags <- relacion %>%
  left_join(tags, by = c("tag_id" = "id")) %>%
  replace_na(list(tag_name="only-r"))

questions_with_tags

```
2. Comparing scores across tags

```{r}
questions_with_tags %>%
  group_by(tag_name)

questions_with_tags %>%
  group_by(tag_name) %>%
  summarize(mean_score = mean(score))

questions_with_tags %>%
  group_by(tag_name) %>%
  summarize(mean_score = mean(score)) %>%
  arrange(mean_score)
```

3. Finding gaps between questions and answers

```{r}
questions
answers

questions %>%
  inner_join(answers, by = c("id" = "question_id"), suffix = c("_question","_answer"))

questions %>%
  inner_join(answers, by = c("id" = "question_id"), suffix = c("_question","_answer")) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(gap = (creation_date_answer - creation_date_question))
  
```
